meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Gadzooks! I can't believe I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Gadzooks! What a pleasant surprise to see you here.
meanings.sent3: Gadzooks! I accidentally spilled my drink all over the table.
meanings.sent4: Gadzooks! The sudden thunderstorm caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: Gadzooks! The magician made the rabbit disappear in a puff of smoke.

meanings.definition: Used to express mild surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Oh gadzooks! That's the biggest ice cream cone I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Wow, gadzooks! The fireworks display was truly spectacular.
meanings.sent3: Hey, gadzooks! I won a free ticket to the concert.
meanings.sent4: Well, gadzooks! The news of their engagement spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: Hooray, gadzooks! The treasure chest was finally found by the brave explorers.
